author: Robin Edds
title: Only A Genius Can Solve 100% Of These Number-Based Riddles
text:
“24 H in a D” becomes “24 hours in a day ”. Got it? Good. Be warned, they get harder… ID: 10618794 1. Guess I give up! 50 States in the United States States in the United States 50 States in the USA States in the USA 50 States in the United States of America States in the United States of America 50 States in the United States. 2. Guess I give up! 1760 Yards in a Mile Yards in a Mile 1760 Yards in a Mile. 3. Guess I give up! 13 in a Baker’s Dozen 13 in a bakers dozen baker’s dozen bakers dozen 13 in a Baker’s Dozen. 4. Guess I give up! 206 Bones in the Human Body Bones in the Human Body 206 Bones in the Human Body. 5. Guess I give up! 52 Cards in a Deck Cards in a Deck 52 Cards in a Deck. 6. Guess I give up! 6 Wives of Henry the Eighth Wives of Henry the Eighth 6 Wives of Henry the 8th Wives of Henry the 8th 6 Wives of Henry VIII Wives of Henry VIII 6 Wives of Henry the Eighth. 7. Guess I give up! 8 Tentacles on an Octopus Tentacles on an Octopus 8 Tentacles on an Octopus. 8. Guess I give up! 4 Horsemen of the Apocalypse 4 Horsemen of the Apocolypse Horsemen of the Apocalypse Horsemen of the Apocolypse 4 Horsemen of the Apocalypse. 9. Guess I give up! 18 Holes on a Golf Course Holes on a Golf Course 18 Holes on a Golf Course. 10. Guess I give up! 29 Days in February in a Leap Year Days in February in a Leap Year 29 Days in Feb in a Leap Year Days in Feb in a Leap Year 29 Days in February in a Leap Year. 11. Guess I give up! 7 Harry Potter Books Harry Potter Books 7 Harry Potter Books. 12. Guess I give up! 45 Presidents of the United States Presidents of the United States 45 Presidents of the US 45 Presidents of the USA Presidents of the US Presidents of the USA 45 Presidents of the United States. 13. Guess I give up! 4 Strings on a Bass Guitar Strings on a Bass Guitar 4 Strings on a Bass Strings on a Bass 4 Strings on a Bass Guitar. 14. Guess I give up! 1 Wheel on a Unicycle Wheel on a Unicycle One Wheel on a Unicycle 1 Wheel on a Unicycle. 15. Guess I give up! 5 Vowels in the Alphabet Vowels in the Alphabet 5 Vowels in the Alphabet. Only A Genius Can Solve 100% Of These Number-Based Riddles SHARE YOUR RESULTS ID: 10618529   
Robin Edds is editor-at-large at BuzzFeed UK
